commitMessage: feat: initialize mock database service with Zimbabwean profiles
prTitle: feat: Project Scaffold & Mock Backend Service
prBody: Initialized the project structure and created `lib/mock-db.ts` to simulate a backend service using LocalStorage. Seeded 20 mock user profiles with authentic Zimbabwean names and locations (Harare, Bulawayo, Mutare, etc.). Implemented methods for `getUser`, `updateUser`, and `getPotentialMatches`. Added a test script `test-mock-db.ts` to verify functionality.
notes: Verified mock database functionality with `bun test-mock-db.ts`. All tests passed.
